Author: drinkpiss69420
Text: I mean it really all depends on what you ate and how much of it but you’d have to have eaten 3500 calories over your TDEE in order to gain anything significant. Avoid the scale for a while if you can cause water retention + binge bloat are not your friend Honestly don’t be too hard on yourself for it because it leads to the “ok, i’m restricting now must lose weight must restrict must compensate” mindset which usually leads to.. more binges.
